posts.post_title: FS/FT T206s cycle, brown hindu, tolstoi (some common backs), and more...
posts.post_content:
Have the following for sale. Prices include delivery w/confirmation/insurance. 

[url]davidposes@gmail.com[/url]

Raw T206s:
Warhop (Cycle): $75
Kleinow (Tolstoi) (horizontal crease): $35
Chase (blur port) (small indentation) :$45
Chase (pink portrait, back damage): $45
Frill: (bought in SGC-A holder, assuming its trimmed): $20

OR... would sell the entire lot of 5 cards for $200 delivered.

Scans: [url]http://s268.photobucket.com/albums/jj16/sesop/Current%20Sale/[/url]

posts.post_title: Chesbro, Browne and Ball are SOLD
posts.post_content:
